content: Six-Monthly Medical Examination MOM includes Physical Examination and Blood Test VDRL plus Pregnancy only, providing up to two times for fourteen months policy and up to four times for twenty six months policy, with premium rates of fifty four dollars and fifty cents for fourteen months and one hundred nine dollars for twenty six months with GST.
questions: What does the Six-Monthly Medical Examination MOM include?
How many times can I undergo the examination for a fourteen months policy?
What is the premium rate for the twenty six months policy?
Is a blood test included in the Six-Monthly Medical Examination MOM?
What is the cost of the fourteen months policy?
How often can I have the examination under the twenty six months policy?
Does the premium rate include GST?
What specific blood test is mentioned in the examination?
Can I get the examination more than twice under the fourteen months policy?
What is the total premium for a fourteen months policy including GST?
